programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae'r Tralalas yn enwi pob anifail sy'n byw yn yr anialwch, ond allwch chi enwi'r planhigyn pigog sy'n tyfu mewn lle poeth a sych fel hyn? The Tralalas explore the hot and dry desert.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Yn y bennod yma byddwn yn dysgu am sut mae'r enfys yn ffurfio, be sy'n neud y gwair yn wyrdd, am fwydydd lliwgar, a llawer mwy. We learn about the 'Aurora Borealis' - the Northern Lights.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliad bach y byd, ac anifeiliaid sy'n hoffi hongian o'r coed yw'r ystlym a'r tarsier. The bat and tarsier are animals that like to hang out of trees.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd â Meurig y gath a Jini a'u cheffylau. Gwesty Sigldigwt is open! Today we meet Meurig the cat and Jini and her horses.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Tybed pam bod dysgu sut mae lifer yn gweithio yn arwain at wneud amser bath yr anifeiliaid yn hwyl a sbri? Blero finds out how levers work, causing bathtime to start with a splash.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Ar ôl i Guto ddweud celwydd sy'n arwain Dili Minllyn i grafangau Mr Cadno, rhaid iddo geisiau achub ei bywyd! Guto tells a lie which leads Dili Minllyn into the clutches of the sly old fox.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau ar saffari! Ond pan mae pethau'n mynd yn fwdlyd, allen nhw gwblhau'r safari? On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are on safari!

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Sut mae Anni'n bwriadu cael gwared ar y bananas ych a fi mae Mam-Gu wedi roi yn ei bocs bwyd? How will Anni get rid of the yucky bananas that Mam-gu's put in her lunchbox?

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Daniel wedi syrffedu ar fod yng nghysgod y Jet-lu, ac yn penderfynu dod yn arwr hefyd. Daniel Jones is fed up with being in the shadow of the Jet-lu. He decides to become a hero too.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Casnewydd sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Casnewydd join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: New: Stwnsh Sadwrn Byw
programme.desc: Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed a Cadi sy' yn y stiwdio, gyda llond lle o gemau, LOL-ian ac ambell pei Stwnsh! Jack, Leah, Lloyd, Jed and Cadi are in the studio with games and the odd Stwnsh pie!

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae tad Anni yn gofyn i Anni a Cai i lanhau wedi'r storm fawr ac ma'r ddau'n troi tasg diflas i un llawn hwyl! Anni's father asks Anni and Cai to help with the cleanup after the great storm. [SL]

programme.title: Gwyliau Gartref
programme.desc: Pentref bywiog Betws-y-Coed yng nghalon Eryri yw'r lleoliad tro ma. Pa garfan fydd yn ennill? Two crews with two different budgets, but who will have the most fun? This time: Betws-y-Coed. [SL]

programme.title: Ffasiwn Drefn
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, cwpwrdd dillad Dafydd Lennon o Gaerdydd sy'n cael ei drawsnewid. This week, the team will be decluttering and transforming Dafydd Lennon's wardrobe at his home in Cardiff. [SL]

programme.title: Ceffylau, Sheikhs a Chowbois
programme.desc: Teithia Sue ac Emrys i Abu Dhabi i weld Rod y mab wrth ei waith i'r teulu brenhinol ar yr ynys breifat. Sue and Emrys' son competes in a show with over £10m dirhams prize money up for grabs. [SL]

programme.title: Arfordir Cymru: Sir Benfro
programme.desc: Bydd Bedwyr yn teithio o Drefdraeth i Abergwaun gan gyfarfod cerflunydd sy'n cael ei ysbrydoli gan enwau'r arfordir. Bedwyr learns about the Pembrokeshire dialect as he travels to Fishguard. [SL]

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn am faterion cefn gwlad. Weekly countryside and farming magazine. [SL]

programme.title: Chris a'r Afal Mawr
programme.desc: Tro hwn mae Chris yn profi bwyd stryd yn Queens, danteithion Chinatown, ac yn paratoi gwledd i'r actor Matthew Rhys. Chris heads to Chinatown and prepares a feast for actor Matthew Rhys. [SL]

programme.title: Sgwrs Dan y Lloer
programme.desc: Heno, sgwrs gyda 'The Voice of Wales', Roy Noble. Clywn am ei blentyndod ym Mrynaman, ei yrfa fel Prifathro, a'i lwyddiant fel un o'n darlledwyr anwyla'. Tonight, a chat with Roy Noble. [SL]

programme.title: Busnes Bwyd
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd. Mae chwech o gynhyrchwyr ac entrepreneuriaid bwyd yn cystadlu am £5K a chynllun mentora unigryw. New series. Six food entrepreneurs compete for the £5K and a mentoring scheme. [SL]

programme.title: Iolo: Natur Bregus Cymru
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen olaf, mae Iolo yn edrych ar effaith cynhesu byd-eang ar fywyd gwyllt. In the final episode, Iolo looks at the effects of global warming on wildlife. [SL]

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae 'na ymwelydd yng ngardd Meinir ym Mhant y Wennol i gynghori ar ail-wampio rhan o'r ardd. Adam is in the Cross Hands community garden, while Sioned reveals top tips for Spring colour. [SL]

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Meinir wrth ei bodd yn croesawu Sioned ag Adam i Bant y Wennol. Adam advises Meinir on using vegetables in an ornamental border, and Sioned creates an interesting display using mint. [SL]

programme.title: Y Ci Perffaith
programme.desc: Y tro ma, mae'r teulu Evans yn cael cwmni dau gi - un bach ac un mwy mewn maint. Ond pa un fydd eu Ci Perffaith? Today, the Evans family are joined by two dogs, one small and one larger.

programme.title: Sgwrs dan y Lloer: Noel Thomas
programme.desc: Sgwrsia Elin gyda'r cyn is-bostfeistr, Noel, a aeth i'r carchar, gan golli popeth. Elin chats to former post master Noel Thomas, who talks openly about the Post Office scandal fallout.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Y Busnes Bwyd
programme.desc: Mae'r cystadleuwyr sy'n weddill yn teithio i Gonwy am dasg marchnata a chyfryngau cymdeithasol. Contestants work as teams to create a social media advert for the Bodnant Welsh Food centre.

programme.title: Cofio Llewod '71
programme.desc: Ailddarllediad yn dilyn marwolaeth diweddar Barry John. Arwyr rygbi Cymru sy'n cofio nôl 50ml ers i'r Llewod ennill cyfres yn Seland Newydd. Special repeat following Barry John's death.

programme.title: Aur y Noson Lawen
programme.desc: Tro hyn bydd y clipiau yn amlygu rôl y teulu yn ein bywydau ac yn olrhain cyfraniad dau deulu talentog i'r rhaglen. A look at the archives of one of Wales' best-loved TV shows.

programme.title: Arctig Gwyllt Iolo Williams
programme.desc: Mae'n dymor paru ar dirwedd galed Twndra'r Arctig lle mae rhai o greaduriaid mwyaf prydferth a nerthol ein planed yn byw. It's mating season on the Arctic Tundra - and a battle for survival.

programme.title: Richard Holt: Yr Academi Felys
programme.desc: Mae'r chwe phobydd yn cwrdd â Rich ym Melin Llynon ac yn cael eu gwers gyntaf yng nghegin yr Academi. The six bakers meet Rich at Melin Llynon and head to the Academy for their first lesson.

programme.title: Ar Led

programme.title: Sion y Chef

programme.desc: Y tro ma, mae'r teulu Evans yn cael cwmni dau gi - un bach ac un mwy mewn maint. Ond pa un fydd eu Ci Perffaith? Today, the Evans family are joined by two dogs, one small and one larger.

programme.title: Cynefin
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae'r criw'n crwydro o amgylch Llandeilo a'r fro, sydd wedi cael eu disgrifio fel un o berlau Dyffryn Tywi. This time, a tour around the jewel in Tywi Valley's crown - Llandeilo.

programme.title: Taith Bywyd
programme.desc: Tro hwn, Jason Mohammad sy'n ymuno efo Owain ar daith emosiynol i gyfarfod y bobl sydd wedi chwarae rhan allweddol yn ei fywyd. Today, Jason Mohammad joins Owain on a journey of his life.

programme.title: Am Dro
programme.desc: Y tro hwn: teithiau rownd Cwm Idwal, Bethesda; Blaenau Ffestiniog; Bwlch Nant yr Arian, Ceredigion; a'r llwybr arfordirol ger y Barri. This week, Catrin, Kevin, Melanie and Mark compete.

programme.title: Yr Ynys: Galapagos
programme.desc: Gerallt Pennant sy'n ymweld ag Ynysoedd y Galapagos lle mae nifer o rywogaethau a chreaduriaid prin. Gerallt Pennant visits the Galapagos Islands where Man must learn to live with nature.

programme.title: Tafwyl 2025
programme.desc: Perfformiadau byw o'r brif lwyfan a'r Tafiliwn, sgyrsiau gydag artistiaid, ac hefyd perfformiadau cerddorol egsglwsif yn yr ardd gudd. Tafwyl highlights: live performances and interviews.

programme.title: Tafwyl 2025
programme.desc: Perfformiadau byw o'r brif lwyfan a'r Tafiliwn, sgyrsiau gydag artistiaid a perfformiadau cerddorol egsgliwsif yn yr ardd gudd. Day 2 highlights at Tafwyl: live performances & interviews.

programme.title: Darn Bach o Hanes
programme.desc: Bydd Dewi yn ymweld â rhai o safleoedd peryclaf y wlad yn y 15fed Ganrif. Following Glyndwr's revolt during the 15th Century, banditry was at an all time high. Dewi visits the hotspots.

programme.title: Ffermio
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn am faterion cefn gwlad. Weekly countryside and farming magazine.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Rhifyn omnibws yn edrych nôl ar ddigwyddiadau yng Nghwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: Hafiach
programme.desc: Mae Lefi yn cael ei wthio i fynd draw i'r ffatri i brofi nad oes ganddo ofn, ond caiff ef ac Ela fraw o ffeindio dieithryn yno. Can Aabis provide answers about the body on the beach?

programme.title: New: Dartiau 6 Gwlad 2025
programme.desc: Pencampwriaeth Dartiau y Chwe Gwlad yn fyw o Glwb Cymdeithasol Penydarren, Merthyr Tudful. Six Nations Darts Championship live from Penydarren Social Club, Merthyr Tydfil.

programme.title: Dylan ar Daith
programme.desc: Y tro hwn bydd Dylan Iorwerth yn teithio i Lundain, Vancouver, Kauai a Hawaii ar drywydd stori David Samwell. The story of Welshman David Samwell who was on board Captain Cook's last voyage.

programme.title: Bois y Rhondda
programme.desc: Yn rhaglen ola'r gyfres, bydd y bois yn dod at ei gilydd mewn digwyddiad carped coch arbennig. In the last in the series, the boys meet up in a special red carpet event.

programme.title: A Prayer for the Dying
programme.desc: 1987. Crime. Directed by Mike Hodges. Stars Mickey Rourke, Bob Hoskins & Alan Bates. An IRA hitman wants out, but the price for his freedom is one last job and it won't be as easy as he thinks. [S]

programme.title: The Big Boodle
programme.desc: 1957. Crime. Directed by Richard Wilson. Stars Errol Flynn, Pedro Armendáriz & Rossana Rory. Cuban crooks and police chase a casino card dealer who is falsely accused of counterfeiting pesos. [S]

programme.title: The Ace of Spades
programme.desc: 1935. Crime drama made at Twickenham Film Studios. Starring Michael Hogan, Dorothy Boyd and Richard Cooper. A man is accused of murder based on evidence written on a playing card. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Channel Tunnel
programme.desc: 1962. A look into the trial tunnel and a look at all the scientific research necessary.

programme.title: Time To Remember
programme.desc: Round the Clock. 1964. Narrated by William Bendix. A focus on events from 1943 to 1944, including a look at the American airmen in Britain and their 'round the clock' activities. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Harvest of Hops
programme.desc: 1962. A Look into a typical London family on their annual hop-picking holiday to Kent.

programme.title: The Son of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: 1940. Action. Director: Rowland V. Lee. Louis Hayward, George Sanders, Joan Bennett. Rightful owner of the kingdom, the Duchess of Zona, is engaged in a power struggle with the evil General Gurko. [S]

programme.title: Joey Leads The Way
programme.desc: 1968. Directed by James Richards. An endearing film of the big 'clean up' at spring time in the countryside and how a donkey saves the day. Nice reminder of a 60s childhood in rural England.

programme.title: Space Patrol
programme.desc: Message from a Star. 1963. Stars Libby Morris, Dick Vosburgh & Ronnie Stevens. A special power unit is fitted to the Galasphere, enabling it to travel at faster-than-light speeds. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Joker's Provokers. 1966. Stars Adam West & Cesar Romero. While Batman and Robin attempt to free themselves, The Joker plans to take over Gotham City using a time machine and hallucinogens. [S]

programme.title: Richard the Lionheart
programme.desc: The Norman King. 1962. Stars Dermot Walsh & Elwyn Brook-Jones. Unaware that the King of Sicily and King Philip are plotting his death, Richard accepts their invitation to a banquet in his honour. [S]

programme.title: Supercar
programme.desc: High Tension. 1961. Stars David Graham, George Murcell & Graydon Gould. Masterspy kidnaps Dr. Beaker and contacts the Supercar organisation with a ransom demand. Dr. Beaker for the car. [S]

programme.title: The Last Load
programme.desc: 1948. Family. Directed by John Baxter. Stars Douglas Barr, Ivor Bowyer & Angela Glynne. Two friends help out two sisters who suspect that someone is sabotaging their father's lorry business. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Pharaoh Stones. 1960. Stars Richard Greene & Archie Duncan. A pedlar gives Little John three stones he claims once belonged to the ancient Egyptian kings, causing trouble in the Greenwood. [S]

programme.title: The Lost Continent (1951)
programme.desc: 1951. Sci-fi. Director: Sam Newfield. Stars Cesar Romero, Hillary Brooke & John Hoyt. Major Joe Nolan leads a search for a downed atomic rocket, but the crew crash-land on an island of dinosaurs. [S]

programme.title: One Step Beyond
programme.desc: The Haunted U-Boat. 1959. Stars John Newland, Werner Klemperer & Eric Feldary. During World War II, a German U-boat is apparently haunted by a loud banging which only occurs when it is submerged. [S]

programme.title: Dick Barton: Special Agent
programme.desc: 1979. Writer: Julian Bond. Mr Parkes (Terence Seward), a playboy, & Mrs Aston (Marsha Fitzalan), wife of a Whitehall official, are threatened by the Drew Brothers (Ernie Drew by Bernard Kay).

programme.title: Captain Scarlet and the Mysterons
programme.desc: Noose of Ice. 1968. Stars Jeremy Wilkin, Lian-Shin Yang & Ed Bishop. A Mysteron agent cuts the power to vital heating elements which threatens the mining operations at Hotspot Tower.

programme.title: Captain Kidd
programme.desc: 1945. Adventure. Directed by Rowland V. Lee. Stars Charles Laughton, Randolph Scott & Barbara Britton. Pirate, Captain William Kidd, tricks the king to hire him as an escort to a treasure ship. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Out of a Bomb-Site
programme.desc: 1962. An intriguing look at cycle speedway. A game born on improvised tracks amid the rubble of the air raids, more than 20 years later, has become a thriving amateur sport.

programme.title: The Ship That Died of Shame
programme.desc: (AKA PT Raiders) 1955. Thriller. Director Basil Dearden. Stars Richard Attenborough, George Baker and Bill Owen. A trio of ex-servicemen begin smuggling black market items into post-war Britain. [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Murder in Montmartre. 1960. Stars Rupert Davies, Freda Jackson & Aubrey Woods. Maigret investigates the murder of a stripper, finding himself mixing with the low life types of Montmartre. [S]

programme.title: A Family At War
programme.desc: 1971. The 48 Hour Pass. Stars Colin Douglas & Shelagh Fraser. David returns on leave with Margaret's illegitimate child expected. Shelia and David grow further apart. (S2, E05) [S]

programme.title: The Key
programme.desc: 1958. War. Director: Carol Reed. Stars William Holden, Sophia Loren, Trevor Howard. A tugboat captain working off the coast of England finds comfort in the arms of the caring and beautiful Stella. [S]

programme.title: The Magic Sword
programme.desc: 1962. Adventure. Directed by Bert I. Gordon. Stars Basil Rathbone, Estelle Winwood & Gary Lockwood. Sir George, a young knight, sets out to rescue the woman he loves from the evil wizard Lodac. [S]

programme.title: The Magic Sword
programme.desc: 1962. Adventure. Directed by Bert I. Gordon. Stars Basil Rathbone, Estelle Winwood & Gary Lockwood. Sir George, a young knight, sets out to rescue the woman he loves from the evil wizard Lodac. [S]

programme.title: Planespotting
programme.desc: 2005. Drama. Director: Christopher Menaul. Stars Lesley Sharp, Mark Benton & Ross Boatman. A group of aircraft enthusiasts are wrongly convicted of spying during a plane spotting trip to Greece. [S]

programme.title: Cabin Boy
programme.desc: 1994. Comedy. Director: Adam Resnick. Stars Chris Elliott, Ritch Brinkley & Brian Doyle-Murray. An arrogant young man plans to go on a Hawaiian cruise, but winds up lost at sea on a fishing boat.

programme.title: Star Performance
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Director: Roy Kellino. Stars Macdonald Carey, Frances Rafferty & Dick Wessel. A clown achieves the fame he desired but at a cost. Can he overcome the loneliness that overshadows him?

programme.title: Look At Life Pictures Tell the Story
programme.desc: 1964. A focus on the distribution of pictures that are increasingly used in newspapers and magazines.

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Beach Casting/Bassett Hounds. 1981. On a playing field near the south coast Jack Hargreaves watches a demonstration of beach casting before visiting a pack of Basset Hounds in Somerset. [S]

programme.title: Wings Over Africa
programme.desc: 1936. Action. Director: Ladislao Vajda. Starring: Joan Gardner, Ian Colin & James Harcourt. Two men come across a skeleton with a letter on the body addressed to a clerk in London named Wilkins. [S]

programme.title: Singing Through
programme.desc: 1935. Comedy. Directed by Max Mack. Stars Bobbie Comber, Bertha Belmore & Cecil Ramage. A rural man is duped into schemes that lead him to London. [S]

programme.title: The Unsinkable Bette Davis
programme.desc: 1963. Hosted by: Joseph Cotten. The professional and personal life of Bette Davis. Clips include footage of her trips to Europe and her films including Now Voyager and Jezebel.

programme.title: Just William's Luck
programme.desc: 1948. Comedy. Director: Val Guest. Stars: William Graham, Garry Marsh, Jane Welsh. Based on the popular books written by Richmal Crompton. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies

programme.title: Behemoth The Seamonster
programme.desc: 1959. Sci-Fi. Atomic marine tests cause the resurrection of a dormant sea-monster who then threatens to destroy London. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Putting on an Act
programme.desc: 1964. The captivating story of amateur dramatics in Britain from Opera to old time music hall.

programme.title: Worzel Gummidge
programme.desc: The Scarecrow Hop. 1979. Stars Jon Pertwee, Una Stubbs & Bill Pertwee. Worzel takes Aunt Sally to the local village dance to cheer her up; problem is, the only dance he knows is the Scarecrow Hop. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Joker's Provokers. 1966. Stars Adam West & Cesar Romero. While Batman and Robin attempt to free themselves, The Joker plans to take over Gotham City using a time machine and hallucinogens. [S]

programme.title: In a Lonely Place
programme.desc: 1950. Drama. Directed by Nicholas Ray. Stars Humphrey Bogart & Gloria Grahame. When a screenwriter is accused of murder his neighbour comes to his rescue, but she soon starts to have her doubts. [S]
